HOME.DESCRIPTION: This project is a Library Catalog application designed to help users browse and manage a collection of books. It provides detailed information about each book, making it easy to search, view, and organize your library efficiently.

REGISTER.TITLE: Register Your Book
REGISTER.IMAGE_ERROR_MESSAGE: Error loading image. Please select a valid image.
REGISTER.ERROR_MESSAGE: Error registering book. Please try again.

PLACEHOLDER.BOOK_SYNOPSIS: The story follows a young prince who visits various planets, including Earth, and addresses themes of loneliness, friendship, love, and loss. Despite its style as a children's book, The Little Prince makes observations about life, adults, and human nature.
